Still, she felt she had already gotten herself wet, so to speak, so she figured she might as well dive right in and think about it later.

"Yeah, I've got room for more." She answered. "Mind getting me something to drink too?"

Like a gracious host Takato smiled. "Sure, I think we have some pop to drink, and I can always get you water if that runs out." Takato hurried to the kitchen and returned a moment later with a 2 liter bottle of orange pop and a large pitcher full of water, setting both down in front of her and picked up the dishes stacked at Rika's feet, showing surprising strength. The acids burned at her throat but she ignored it, chugging quickly, rapidly downing the huge drink and she wondered if she could down the whole thing in one breath. Grinning at herself with her own challenge she tilted the bottle up even more, and chugged as fast as she could, letting the drink pour into her belly almost as fast as gravity would let it. She could feel it saturating the contents of her belly, it flt quite cool compared to the rest of it. Finally the last drop fell into her mouth and down her slippery gullet and she gasped. "Aha.... ahaha, I did it." She wheezed, proud of herself for her accomplishment. A whole two liter bottle guzzled in one shot. With so much food inside to soak up the fluid she wondered if she would even be able to burp if she wanted to. She had no more time to think about it as Takato arrived with armfuls of scrumptious looking foods.

Meatloaf, steak, chicken fingers, deep fried prawns and another basket of freshly baked buns. Rika's mouth drooled anew as she watched the spread laid out before her, her hunger now a tool to enable her to eat so much delicious looking food instead of a case of concern. She'd be concerned later, right now she had some eating to do.

Rika grabbed the meatloaf first, bringing it closer and burying her face right into it, holding it between her hands and tearing into it with her teeth. Rika grabbed the chicken strips next, shoving one after the other into her mouth, taking an occasional fried prawn to add some variety until both plates were clean and discarded. She grabbed a bun in each hand and shoved them both into her mouth one after the other, her cheeks puffing out like a chipmunk's before taking one almighty swallow that sent them down her throat as a huge lump before it landed in her increasingly packed gut. Finally there was only the steak. She picked it up in her hands and tore a chunk off with her mouth, the warm juices coating her chin and dripping onto her increasingly messy belly top. She finally gobbled it all up and took a moment to rub her stuffed belly with her greasy fingers.

"Mmmm when did you become such a good cook Takato. I bet you can even cook better than Jeri now."

Takato laughed nervously. "Well like I said, I learned a little and she taught me a few things too. I'm uh... more impressed by you. You can really eat a lot. I guess that's why mom hired you as the taster."

Rika suddenly felt a little self-conscious. Takata had been polite in what he'd said, but she couldn't help but think of alternative hidden meanings to his words and wondered if he was actually being sincere. Then again, he had a point; she noticed she had been eating a lot more since becoming taster and Mrs. Matsuki had encouraged her a lot.... wait was that it? Had she had this hidden appetite all along and had only unlocked it thanks to Mrs. Matsuki's ample baking and encouragement? Had she really been.... a pig this whole time? Was this her real self? She didn't know. She couldn't think of how to answer that, but she did manage to find one for Takato.

"Yeah well.... you're mom's trained me well."

"Uh yeah I guess she's good at that. Uh... there is one cake for dessert if you want it."

Rika perked up at the mention of cake. She was stuffed, really stuffed, but dessert, a cake, more sweets, the things that Mrs. Matsuki had allegedly been training her on. She could do it, she knew she could. "Yeah bring it!" She said enthusiastically. "I'll show you the results of my training."

Takata grimaced. "Well, it's not like I need it proven to me more..." His voice trailed off as he left the dining room to retrieve the cake.

Rika blushed a bit at his comment, but didn't take it personally. She had been a glutton, a pig, undeniably so, but the notion that this might be her true self did have her wondering. Was she being more true to herself, acting as she should actually be acting by being this big of a glutton? She couldn't deny that she did enjoy the experience of gorging on large amounts of food. She loved eating, she couldn't deny that, but she was apprehensive about becoming the size of a whale, and at the rate she was going sh'd have trouble just fitting through the door by the end of the week.

Takato's arrival back in the room ceased her self-reflection and her mouth opened wide at the large chocolate cake Takato carried in and lay before her. It was three thick layers with two of chocolate sandwiching one of fudge, all stacked with a thick coating of chocolate frosting. Her eyes glazed over as she leaned forward to devour it, Takato running to the corner of the room to save himself from the carnage she was about to unleash and unleash it she did.

She tore into the cake mercilessly, shredding it as she shoved handfuls into her mouth as fast as she could put them. Bits of cake fell onto her gut and splashed all over the room, Rika's face turning dark with chocolate frosting. It was so delicious, so decadent and delectable, her body demanded it be put inside her as soon as possible, like it was oxygen.

The cake was gone in mere minutes, Rika licked the plate clean and even bits that had fallen onto the table. When she started picking up the bits of food that covered her belly, Takato felt it was safe enough to approach her.

"So uh... Rika. Are you planning on going home tonight or would you like to stay?"

Rika paused and gazed inwardly. She should probably go home if she could, but this massive gut would be easily noticeable by everyone and very embarrassing to go walking around in, assuming she could even walk at this point. Staying at the bakery would have the benefit of letting her sleep off her massive meal, hopefully digesting enough that her shirt would fit over her gut, though she doubted that. Also, her grandmother might be adverse to letting her stay at a boy's house, alone with him no less. It was possible she could avoid actually mentioning that Takato's parents were out of town, but knowing how the parents of the tamers kept in touch, she probably already knew. She could take a taxi home which would save her some embarrassment, and she could care less what some old cab driver thought about her big belly. "Guy should be happy to see any part of a real girl naked" she muttered to herself.

"Hm?"

"Oh nothing." She said.

"How do pregnant women do this all the time?"

Takato chuckled. "You do look a pregnant I guess. M-maybe if you wear maternity shirts, it'll hide your belly more."

Rika raised an eyerbrow at Takato's suggestion, not because it was ludicrous, rather it made sense. Her belly did seem to be the part of her getting fat the fastest and it was about the same size as a pregnant belly would be on a woman, she supposed. Still, somehow the connotations didn't appeal to her. Then again, she might not have a choice if she wanted to keep her job and eating habits, something she was still unsure about.

Rika used her fingers to pick the rest of the food crumbs and chunks off her belly but it was still quite stained and painfully obvious contrasted against her white tummy flesh. She suspected her face was in a similar state. "Damn, I've gotten to be such a pig" she sighed. "Eh, I'll think about it later. I have to think how I'll explain this gut to grandma if she's home."

Takato returned a moment later with the water pitcher in hand. She'd forgotten about that. "She's on her way, be just a few minutes" He said, setting the pitcher down beside her. "Figured you'd be thirsty again."

"Thanks. Uh, mind getting me some paper towels so I can clean up?" Rika's cheeks warmed to a dark pink colour at the request but Takato only gave her his usual goofy smile.

"Sure, no problem." He scampered back to the kitchen yet again, giving Rika enough time to pour the entire contents of the water pitcher inside her. The cool liquid was refreshing to her mouth, throat and stomach, somehow relaxing it. She set it down just as Takato returned with a roll of paper towels. She grasped it thankfully and ripped off a few squares, wiping her face and grimacing when she saw how filthy it was. She kept wiping until no filth was left and then she worked on her belly, cleaning up it's smooth pale surface until it was all clean.

A honking car horn disturbed the night outside and Takato went to the door. "It's probably the cab."

Rika tossed the paper towels and grabbed the couch arm again. "Okay, be right there."

Rika uttered a loud grunt of effort and got up to her feet. It wasn't that much weight really, but because she wasn't used to it, she felt very imbalanced and heavy. She suddenly had a new respect for all pregnant women and mothers. "Now I know why most animals aren't bipeds" she muttered. She waddled slowly towards the door, wary of her extra weight and bulk until she found the side door in the kitchen.

Standing there with Takato was a slightly tanned woman with long wavy dark hair and deep green eyes. She wore a short red jacket and blue jeans not unlike her own. She seemed to be having a nice chat with Takato which meant they probably knew each other, knowing how shy Takato normally was. She spotted Rika out of the corner of her eye and smiled at her.

"Hey there, enjoying the Matsuki bakery I see." Rika resisted the urge to swear a retort but held her tongue. She wasn't able to hide her blush though, but the woman just laughed. "Aww don't worry about it girl, I've come outta here with a belt buster myself a couple 'a times. Takato's mom sure loves stuffing girls silly."

Rika raised an eyebrow. "She does?"

"Oh yeah. I guess it's the baker part of her that doesn't like seeing anyone that looks hungry. Can't say I regret the free food but it's a hell of a time driving with a belly like that I can tell 'ya." She patted her exposed but only slightly soft looking tummy for emphasis.

Rika relaxed a bit. Now she understood more of why Takato had chosen this particular cab driver. It was a load off her mind and her self respect. She now felt she really owed Takato now.

"Anyways you're probably just barely standin'. Let's get ya in the van." Rika winced at the word 'van'. 'Guess I'm too fat for a car.' she thought half seriously.

Takato held the door open for her and she stepped out into the cool night air. Gooseflesh started to prickle her skin, especially the expanse of her belly, almost as soon as she stepped out. Fortunately the Van was only a few steps away and the driver had already opened the side door to let her in. With both Takato and her help, Rika was able to get inside but she noticed there was no real seat, only a set of straps. The cab driver stepped in and began tying her up in these sturdy looking black straps, keeping her securely in place.

"Um, what is this?" She asked.

"Oh it's like a seat belt, only there's no seat." She explained. "A lot of people who ah... enjoy their food a lot can't always get in or fit in normal seats ya see." She smiled. "Also handy for that one pregnant lady with quints. Damn she was a hell of a woman, wish I could be as strong as her."

Rika let out a heavy breath. She was struggling with just a stuffed gut; she couldn't imagine what a belly full of five babies would be like.

"Okay you're all strapped in." The driver stepped out and let Takato and Rika share a wave of parting before she slid the door shut. A moment later the driver was in the seat and they were off.

"I'm Sabine by the way." The driver said. "I specialize in taking uh... handicapped people around." She grinned knowingly at Rika thorough the rear-view mirror.

"Rika." The redhead answered.

"Nice to meet you Rika, and I bet we'll be meeting again after tonight hm?"

Rika's cheeks heated up. "W-well I guess so since I have a job as Mrs. Matsuki's taste tester."

"Oh is that so? Well if the Matsuki bakery gets even better I'm going to have a busy business." She laughed. "How long have you been at it."

"A little while." Rika answered. "Not too long."

"Well here's hoping you have a good time at it. If Takato's anything like his mom, I'm sure you will."

Rika sighed inwardly but she had learned something about Mrs. Matsuki. She liked to see people well fed. That had to be why she never complained when Rika ate a lot more than she really needed to. It might have also explained Takato cooking so much and not complaining much around dinner time, although he was understandably timid earlier in the day.

"Well I guess we will be seeing each other more, although I don't know how my family will take my... condition."

Sabine shrugged. "Awww it's not too bad. It's your job afterall, plus if they eat the same chow, they'll inflate pretty quick too and they'll be begging you to eat all their food so they don't get big."

Rika chuckled at the thought of her mother suddenly succumbing to an episode of gluttony. "Maybe, but I still don't think it'll go over well, though I guess my grandma likes to spoil me."

"And if she gets jealous she might try to outdo Mrs. Matsuki." Sabine laughed. "Then I'll have to use a flatbed to take you around."

Rika grimaced. "Well I hope it doesn't get to that point, but.... well I guess it's just a way of showing love."

Sabine smiled and nodded. "That's right. Everyone shows love in their own way, and as long as you're fine with it, that's all that really matters."

Rika thought back to Mrs. Matsuki and Takato and how well they had been taking care of her. It brought a sentimental smile to her lips and a hand fell onto her belly, giving it an affectionate rub. "Yeah, love."

She didn't react however, so Rika continued.

Every step was nerve-wracking, her heart was pounding as she tried to sneak by. So far so good, everything was going fine so far.

*Grrrruuuuurrrrrppppgl*

Rika froze and swore internally. Her belly's sudden noise was so loud she bet the neighbours could have heard it.

"Oh, welcome home Rika." her grandmother greeted. "How was work today?"
